display_long_description:
Prepare to descend into the foreboding depths of Witty Gorilla, a chilling horror adventure that will keep your heart pounding and your instincts on edge. In this fan-made experience, you'll find yourself lost in an intricate maze of dark and haunting caves, where every echo, every shadow, and every footstep could spell your doom.

As you navigate through the cavernous terrain, you'll encounter relentless gorillas that stalk the tunnels with uncanny precision and terrifying speed. Your survival depends on your sharp reflexes and quick thinking, as you'll need to climb, leap, and outmaneuver your pursuers to stay alive. But it's not just about survival—hidden within these treacherous caves are sinister secrets waiting to be discovered, whispering tales of a dark past and an unknown horror that looms deeper underground.

With immersive gameplay, bone-chilling soundscapes, and a vividly unsettling atmosphere, Witty Gorilla promises to test not only your agility but your courage as well. Can you escape the clutches of terror, unravel the cave’s darkest mysteries, and make it out alive? Or will you become just another lost soul in the depths?
